About

hetre85 is programmer living in Austin, TX which is home to the world's most magical tacos. You can find him writing Ruby code by a river or stream, engineering a Rails app under a Town Lake sunrise, or playing guitar on the pedestrian bridge.

hetre85 is an independent contractor who is currently booked up, but is happy to hear about what you are working on as long as you are not a recruiter :)

Designed by Jesse Crow and developed by Hunter Stewart & Jesse Crow. Powered by Jekyll and Typekit.
